Title: XNA Tanks Game
Description: Terrain render with Quadtree, Level of Detail control and Drawable Game Components with Animation Controller
HomeWiki:
Tanks Game

Another stupid XNA game where some tanks try to destroy another tanks.

Some terrain, some tanks, some explosions, a lot of smoke, you know.

Thanks to Clyde Coulter and his Quadtreeload Component. It was my terrain component base

And thanks too to Riemer's XNA tutorials and his 4th series XNA tutorial

This is my developer's blog: devagame

I upload the complete source code for free download and use
